name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flatwork ATS: Email Finder for Recruiters

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find Email Addresses & Mobile Numbers for Recruiting and Hiring

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a way to quickly find prospect email addresses and phone numbers? 

With Flatwork ATS for Chrome, any recruiter can start sourcing talents from LinkedIn within seconds. Recruiters can get contact name, email address and phone numbers and directly sync with their talent pool on Flatwork.

WHAT IS FLATWORK ATS FOR CHROME?

Flatwork ATS is a modern recruiting software that combines applicant tracking system functionalities with recruitment software features. With just one tool, a startup can create a job listing, have candidates apply for jobs, source candidates from LinkedIn with their email addresses and phone numbers.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ðŸ”Ž  LinkedIn Email Finder: View any LinkedIn profile and click on the Flatwork Chrome Extension icon to get the prospect's full name, your Flatwork talent pools, prospect email addresses and phone numbers. Click add to Flatwork button to add to your pool.

ðŸ›«  Email Nurture/Sequence Campaigns: Add your prospects to any talent pool then include them in any nurture campaign. Send emails to thousands of prospects based on rules you define, automatically. View the statistics to see how your campaigns run.

âœ…  Email Open Tracking: After linking your Gmail or Outlook email to Flatwork, you can track every email you sent from Flatwork. You can see the open rates and discover each individual's open status for your email campaign.

ðŸš¥  Talent Pools and Pipeline Management: Add your prospects with Flatwork ATS for Chrome and manage their stages from Flatwork directly. See how each prospect is using from a clean dashboard and take actions as you need to with your team.

WHO IS FLATWORK ATS FOR?

Flatwork ATS is used by recruiters, recruiting agencies, startups, hiring managers, HR teams and pretty much anyone who needs to recruit fast remotely.

ðŸ«° INSTALL FLATWORK ATS FOR FREE!

Flatwork ATS is free to start for all users. Once you sign up, you will be able to freely use the basic functionalities of the tool.

WHY FLATWORK ATS FOR RECRUITING & HIRING?

Flatwork ATS for Chrome is an all-in-one tool perfect for all startups and recruiters. At an affordable price, recruiters can create talent pools, set up automated email campaigns, sequences and view their statistics. This extension gives you access to over 160 Million email addresses and phone numbers.

For more info:
Email: help@theflatwork.com
Website: https://theflatwork.com/
Privacy Policy: https://www.theflatwork.com/privacy-policy
